p: Acetylsalicylic acid (ASA) is one of the most widely used drugs in the world. It is used as an analgesic, antipyretic, and anti-inflammatory [ 31, 32]. This drug also has antiplatelet or anticoagulant effects and is used to prevent heart attacks, strokes, and blood clots [ 33]. However, its use can also lead to exacerbated respiratory tract disease and cancer [ 32, 34].
